tool_description: Upwork API to access Upwork Public data
name: Upwork API
title: Upwork API

api_list.name: Get skills
api_list.description: Returns a list of skills available in a freelancer's profile.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://upwork-api2.p.rapidapi.com/metadata/skills"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "upwork-api2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get categories

api_list.name: Get freelancer profile information
api_list.description: This call returns an exhaustive list of attributes associated with the freelancer.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://upwork-api2.p.rapidapi.com/freelancers/~010e8757b6ebca16e2"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "upwork-api2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://upwork-api2.p.rapidapi.com/freelancers/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "upwork-api2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get specific job
api_list.description: This call returns the complete job object by job id.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://upwork-api2.p.rapidapi.com/jobs/~0104e35513dd52ef73"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "upwork-api2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search jobs
api_list.description: This request searching Upwork jobs by given keyword. Response value will be paginated and if you need to get next page data set the 'offset' and 'count' query parameters. By default value of 'offset' is '0' and 'count' is 50.
